entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING IN EFFECT, Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 09:40 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: ESE 61 km/h gust 79 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning this morning. Periods of snow over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 5 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening then becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8 except plus 3 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8 except plus 3 in onshore winds. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
